mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT `name`) FROM raw_event_enter WHERE TO_DAYS( NOW( ) ) - TO_DAYS( `client_time` ) <= 1;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT `name`) FROM raw_event_enter WHERE TO_DAYS( NOW( ) ) - TO_DAYS( `client_time` ) <= 30;
SELECT TO_DAYS( NOW( ) ) - TO_DAYS( `client_time` ) as `day` , COUNT(DISTINCT `name`) as `count` FROM raw_event_enter GROUP BY TO_DAYS( NOW( ) ) - TO_DAYS( `client_time` );
SELECT TO_DAYS( NOW( ) ) - TO_DAYS( `client_time` ) as `day` , COUNT(id) as `count` FROM raw_view_page GROUP BY TO_DAYS( NOW( ) ) - TO_DAYS( `client_time` );
SELECT TO_DAYS( NOW( ) ) - TO_DAYS( `client_time` ) as `day` , ROUND(SUM(time / 1000)) as `count` FROM raw_span_view GROUP BY TO_DAYS( NOW( ) ) - TO_DAYS( `client_time` );
SELECT HOUR(client_time) as `hour` , COUNT(`name`) / COUNT(DISTINCT `name`) as `count` FROM raw_event_enter GROUP BY HOUR(client_time);
